hero.title: Multilingual service desks that boost satisfaction
hero.subtitle: Primex operates 24/7 service desks that handle inquiries, after-sales care, claims, and retention programs across every channel—email, phone, chat, and social. Our multilingual teams (DE, EN, and more) deliver consistent, brand-aligned support that turns customers into advocates.

sections.offeringsSubtitle: From first contact to loyalty programs, we cover every touchpoint in the customer journey.

pillars.title: Inquiry management
pillars.body: Professional multilingual teams handle customer questions, product information requests, and technical support across email, phone, chat, and social channels.

pillars.title: After-sales care
pillars.body: Proactive follow-up, warranty support, and maintenance guidance ensure customers stay satisfied long after purchase.

pillars.title: Claims processing
pillars.body: Efficient claims handling with clear communication, fast resolution, and documentation that protects both customer and brand.

pillars.title: Retention programs
pillars.body: Loyalty initiatives, win-back campaigns, and personalized outreach that turn one-time buyers into repeat customers.

benefits: Integrated with your CRM and ticketing systems

cta.title: Ready to elevate your customer experience?
cta.body: Let's assemble a Primex service desk that handles inquiries, claims, and retention—delivering support that reflects your brand values.
